comments_since_last_sample.body: just smeeled this master peice recently but it's out of my budget
I would love to enter the giveaway! I actually haven’t worn the OG! I own Profumo and have sampled Profondo, both of which are fantastic. Thank you to Ash, Macy’s, and Armani for this opportunity!
I’d like to be entered in the adg giveaway this scent is just clean and great can never go wrong sadly I don’t own it in my collection no more since I’ve used up my old bottle
I’ve never rocked ADG yet but have always wanted to try it.
i wish could rock adg, my dad used to wear it alot and every time i go to the mall i get a refresher into the scent.

I'd like to be entered into the give away. I have a decant of aqua di gio, and a full size bottle of profondo.  I also have perry ellis 360 red 😆

Thanks!
Ofcourse I’ve wore ADG .. I thought we all did at some point .
I would love to enter the giveaway, my brother rocks Perry Ellis 360 red and I absolutely love it, but I have never tried ADG. Thank you Ash for the opportunity.
I would like to enter the giveaway, I've tried clons of the ADG but not ADG itself, but I'm sure the real OG is something else.
Never worn adg before but I definitely want to get my hands on it

My goodness that Aqua Di Gio brings back such amazing memories my mother bought for me for Christmas many of years ago when came out.  I couldn’t have been more than 20 years of age and I loved it that much that I used it sparingly normally when i was taking a girl out to the city and honestly I mostly wore in winter smelt great off my sweaters.  Not knowing much back in those days did not realize it would expire.  i had it for more than 20 years before throwing the bottle away by that time was shot lol 

I may go buy a bottle in a paycheck or two thanks for reminding me how great it is 👏👏👏
